title: Chad Inflation Rate
description: Inflation Rate in Chad decreased to 7.20 percent in September from 7.70 percent in August of 2022. Inflation Rate in Chad averaged 1.94 percent from 1984 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 41.72 percent in December of 1994 and a record low of -13.06 percent in December of 1986. In Chad, the inflation rate measures a broad rise or fall in prices that consumers pay for a standard basket of goods. This page provides - Chad Inflation Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Institut National de la Statistique, des Etudes Economiques et Démographiques (INSEED), Tchad
